Title: Requires the commissioner of education to direct the resumption of interscholastic sports during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to direct the resumption of interscholastic sports during the COVID-19 pandemic and requires proper safety protocols be put in place to enable the safe play of such sports.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to resuming the play of interscholastic sports during the COVID-19 pandemic and requiring safety protocols to be put in place to enable safe play of such sports
